column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=We can also secure our borders without abandoning the values upon which our nation was built .
#Text=We must first admit that our current system of immigration is broken and recognize that a wall is not the solution .
#Text=Then , we must create a more intelligent , effective and efficient way of welcoming well-vetted immigrants to our borders and providing them with a clear pathway to citizenship .
#Text=With respect to national security :
#Text=Again , Article I , Section 8 of the Constitution directs us to " provide for the common Defense . . . of the United States . "
#Text=However , it does not say that we must do it in a fiscally irresponsible way .

#Text=It is not the government 's responsibility to support a military – industrial complex simply because it has allowed that structure to become unduly important in the financing of our political parties .
#Text=Our focus should be to maintain a technological superiority over every other military on earth in as cost effective way as possible .
#Text=Our ability to project force in a timely manner , when necessary , should be measured against current capabilities rather than historic principles .
#Text=We do not need to maintain military bases abroad to the degree that we do .
#Text=We can project force far more efficiently today than we could decades ago when many of those installations first were built .
#Text=We also have to recognize that the enemy has changed as has the weaponry .
#Text=Cyber-attack s on infrastructure and financial services pose new threats as do terrorist attacks ( as opposed to traditional invasion tactics ) .

#Text=We need to build an intelligence capability that can identify and anticipate such threats and a counter-cyber capability that can defend against and respond to the delivery of any such attacks .

#Text=With respect to social equality : My number one priority as President would be to refocus our country on providing an equal opportunity to all with regard to jobs , education , healthcare , etc.
#Text=We have established programs that make our leaders feel good but , from a practical perspective , fail to advance the cause of delivering an equal opportunity to all .
#Text=As a result , we waste a great deal of time and taxpayer money on programs that have not improved our nation or the lives of its citizens .
#Text=We need to return to the concept that " all men are created equal " and have the unalienable right to pursue happiness as they choose to define it .
#Text=This does not mean that we all have to choose the same path or achieve parity in income , etc.
#Text=It means that we should be given the tools and choices that are necessary to be able to pursue our individual definition of happiness .
#Text=" Equality " supports the right to be different ; however , it demands the opportunity to choose which path to pursue .
#Text=I would do everything in my power to provide every citizen with an equal opportunity to make that choice .

#Text=This alone would stimulate our economy , resolve many of our social issues , and underscore the importance of the concept of individual Liberty that separates our country from any other nation on Earth .
